Title: Relates to the notification of county boards of elections of an individual's death
Summary: Relates to the notification of county boards of elections of an individual's death and the subsequent removal of such voter's name from the applicable registration roll.
LawCode: Amd ยง4140, Pub Health L; amd ยง5-400, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the election law, in relation to notifying county boards of elections of an individual's death
